item.title: WeWork India IPO Sees Subdued Demand On Day 1 Despite Strong Brand Backing — Analysts Cite High Valuation Concerns
item.description: WeWork India’s ₹3,000-crore IPO opened for public subscription on Friday at a price band of ₹615–₹648 per share.
